column2: Considering all  available material and the reasons  discussed  above,  I find that there is
no  exclusive  evidence  against  the  accused  appellant for  committing  murders  of 1st

column1: conviction for murder cannot be sustained.

column2: Accordingly,  we  allow the  appeal  and  set  aside  the  conviction  and  sentence  against

column1: the accused appellant on both counts.
